name: Hero Banner
description: Large banner section with heading, subheading, and call-to-action button
default_content: {"heading":"Welcome to Our Website","subheading":"Create amazing experiences with our platform","buttonText":"Get Started","buttonLink":"#"}

name: Text Block
description: Rich text content block with optional heading (supports Markdown)
default_content:
{"heading":"Section Heading","text":"This is a text block. You can use **Markdown** formatting for _rich text_.

- Bullet points
- Are supported
- As well"}

name: Two Column Layout
default_content: {"leftHeading":"Left Column","leftContent":"Content for the left column goes here.","rightHeading":"Right Column","rightContent":"Content for the right column goes here."}
content_schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"leftHeading":{"type":"string","title":"Left Column Heading","placeholder":"Enter heading"},"leftContent":{"type":"string","title":"Left Column Content","placeholder":"Enter content (Markdown supported)","format":"textarea"},"rightHeading":{"type":"string","title":"Right Column Heading","placeholder":"Enter heading"},"rightContent":{"type":"string","title":"Right Column Content","placeholder":"Enter content (Markdown supported)","format":"textarea"}}}

name: Call-to-Action Button
description: Standalone button with customizable link and styling
content_schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"text":{"type":"string","title":"Button Text","placeholder":"e.g., Learn More"},"link":{"type":"string","title":"Link URL","placeholder":"e.g., /contact"},"alignment":{"type":"string","title":"Alignment","enum":["left","center","right"]},"openInNewTab":{"type":"boolean","title":"Open in New Tab"}},"required":["text","link"]}

name: Image
content_schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"imageUrl":{"type":"string","title":"Image URL","placeholder":"Enter image URL or upload"},"altText":{"type":"string","title":"Alt Text","placeholder":"Describe the image for accessibility"},"caption":{"type":"string","title":"Caption (Optional)","placeholder":"Image caption"}},"required":["imageUrl"]}

name: Image Hero
description: Full-width hero section with layered background and foreground images. Perfect for creating framed hero sections with transparent overlays.
content_schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"backgroundImageUrl":{"type":"string","title":"Background Image URL","description":"The main background image (typically a photo of a person or scene)","format":"uri"},"foregroundImageUrl":{"type":"string","title":"Foreground Frame Image URL","description":"Transparent PNG image that frames the background (with knockout/transparent areas)","format":"uri"},"height":{"type":"string","title":"Hero Height","enum":["small","medium","large","full-screen"],"default":"medium","description":"The vertical height of the hero section"},"contentAlignment":{"type":"string","title":"Content Alignment","enum":["left","center","right"],"default":"center","description":"Horizontal alignment for any overlay content"},"overlayOpacity":{"type":"number","title":"Dark Overlay Opacity","minimum":0,"maximum":100,"default":0,"description":"Optional dark overlay between background and foreground (0-100)"}},"required":["backgroundImageUrl","foregroundImageUrl"]}

name: Wall of Fame
description: Display sections of people (staff, board, etc.) with interactive profile cards
content_schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"section_id":{"type":"string","title":"Wall of Fame Section","description":"Select which Wall of Fame section to display"}},"required":["section_id"]}

name: Form
description: Embed a form from the Form Management system

name: Text Overlay Image
description: Single column layout with background image and customizable text overlay with positioning, border, and opacity controls

name: Table/Grid
description: Create customizable tables with configurable rows and columns

name: Banner Carousel
description: Rotating hero banner section with multiple slides

name: Showcase
description: Display 4 cards from News, Resources, Articles, or Jobs

name: Button Block
description: A block with a header and up to 4 styled buttons

name: Page Header Hero
description: Hero image with text header positioned left or right

name: Resources Showcase
description: Three-column layout with header, description, CTA button, and resource cards
